channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #Crickit | Former pacer Mohamm
item.description: #Crickit | Former pacer Mohammad Asif didn't mince words while slamming the #Pakistan team (via CrickIt)

item.title: Being flexible is good for you
item.description: Being flexible is good for your health. Know the benefits of flexibility and exercises and stretches to improve it for better health. Keyphrase Health benefits of flexibility

item.title: West Bengal CM and #TMC suprem
item.description: West Bengal CM and #TMC supremo #MamataBanerjee dedicated the party's student wing ‘Trinamool Chhatra Parishad’ foundation day to the woman trainee doctor who was raped and murdered at the #RGKarHospital More details here: https://www.hindustantimes.com/.../mamata-banerjee...
